That's pretty cool!

You know, I want to see more Anthro or furry cartoons.

Like Swat Cats and if Star Fox ever got a cartoon/Anime. [/bq]
Sorry, but I'm going to rip this bandage right off and it's going to fucking hurt; thanks to all the major networks pushing live action so hard and pushing cartoons to have less and less air time chances are whenever you have kids their reaction to anthropomorphics on television will be "mommy why is that animal talking and why does it look humanoid?"  "That's called anthropomorphics; it's applying human traits to animal cartoon characters" "That's silly; I want to watch Michael Bay Evangelion instead."
